title: Hecarim Ultimate Bug
body: I have observed a bug within Hecarims Ultimate. It didnt fear anything like it should do and i think the Damage wasnt applied either. 5 minutes later however it worked just fine, feared everything and dealt dmg. another 5 minutes later the bug reappeared and nothing got feared or dealt dmg to.

replies.body: Only your spectral riders on both sides fear, not the middle of your ult.
I know. Still the bug appeared
